title: Service-Level Agreement (SLA) for OV Nodes
description: Defines minimum performance guarantees for nodes in the OV ecosystem.

namespaceId.description: DID of the Namespace the node belongs to.

nodeType.description: The type of node operating under this SLA.

measurementPeriod.description: Time period over which uptime is measured (e.g., 30 days).

maxProcessingTime.description: Maximum allowed compute processing time (in milliseconds).

financialPenalty.description: Penalty applied if the Node fails SLA requirements (e.g., reduced staking rewards, service fees).

trustScoreImpact.description: Negative impact on the Nodeâ€™s trust score if SLA terms are violated.

downgradeStatus.description: Whether the Node can be downgraded to a lower-tier role upon SLA violations.

failureCompensation.description: Defines penalties and consequences for failing to meet SLA obligations.

bonusForHighUptime.description: Whether nodes get rewards for exceeding SLA targets.

feeReductions.description: Whether nodes can receive reduced operational fees for high performance.

compensationIncentives.description: Defines incentive mechanisms for high-performance Nodes.

monitoringEntity.description: DID of the entity monitoring SLA compliance.

auditFrequency.description: How often the node is audited for SLA compliance (e.g., monthly, quarterly).

onChainLogging.description: Whether compliance logs are recorded on-chain for transparency.

complianceMonitoring.description: Specifies how SLA compliance is monitored and enforced.

requiredStakeAmount.description: Minimum amount of tokens staked to participate as a Node.

slashingConditions.description: Conditions under which staked tokens can be slashed (e.g., repeated SLA violations).

stakingRequirements.description: Defines staking and collateral mechanisms for Nodes.

conditionsForRemoval.description: Conditions under which a Node is removed from the Cluster.

gracePeriod.description: Amount of time the Node has to fix compliance issues before removal.

appealProcess.description: Procedure for a Node to challenge its removal from the Cluster.

revocationPolicy.description: Defines rules for Node removal due to SLA non-compliance.

agreementSigned.description: Whether the Node operator has accepted the SLA.
